name: Death's Weight
description:
Command zombies to make buildings before the time's over. Use poisons to summon undeads who will repeat yours last actions

There are 5 types of poison:

  • Default
  • Speed
  • Strength
  • Intelligence
  • Double

Finish all levels to get a surprising ending.

This game was made for the 33rd GDL Game Jam which the theme was "Death is not the end... Death is progress." .

Game Engine used: Godot 3.5
